No matter when an election is held to replace Lee, Kirsten Gillibrand is confident his district will be well represented. They have representation right now, through myself and Senator Chuck Schumer , every minute of every day. Senator Chuck Schumer and I are committed to making sure their voice in Washington is as strong as it's ever been. Kirsten Gillibrand also is continuing Lee's efforts towards helping the victims of Flight 3407. Lee pushed for tougher flight safety legislation after the crash and Kirsten Gillibrand said she will continue to do so.``

know, there's a lot of talk these days around here about where members of Congress are going to sit during the State of the Union address,'' Indiana Republican Mike Pence said recently on the House floor.
